item.question:
countervail
[ˈkaʊntərveɪl]
item.answer:
【考法】 vt. 抗衡，抵消: to exert force against; counteract
【例】 The extent to which these various unknown factors countervail each other remains uncertain. 这些未知因素彼此之间的抗衡程度仍无法确定。
【近】 compensate, counteract, counterbalance, counterpoise, neutralize, offset
【派】 countervailing adj. 抗衡的，抵消的
